description:
When you’re going fast and light in bear country, this is your canister. A downsized version of the classic BV500, the BV425-Sprint was designed for 1-2 day trips. The transparent polycarbonate construction is super strong and makes it easy to see the contents. Integrated retention guides add security when strapping to your pack.

  • “Wide and slippery” reduces a bear’s mechanical advantage
  • Rugged polycarbonate construction stands up to bears and can handle pulling double duty as a stool
  • Screw on lid is easy to open for hands, and nearly impossible to open for jaws and paws
  • 5L capacity
  • Diameter is 22cm, height is 15.2cm
  • Certification by the Interagency Grizzly Bear Committee (IGBC)
  • Some areas require specific bear caches. Check with local bear cache regulations
name: BearVault BV425 Sprint Bear Resistant Food Canister
